scripts.build:js: babel src/js/index.jsx --out-file dist/react-tooltip.js & babel src/js/index.jsx --out-file example/src/react-tooltip.js
scripts.build:css: node-sass --output-style compressed src/scss/style.scss dist/react-tooltip.css & node-sass --output-style compressed src/scss/style.scss example/src/react-tooltip.css
scripts.watch:js: watchify src/js/index.jsx -t babelify -o dist/react-tooltip.js -dv & watchify src/js/index.jsx -t babelify -o example/src/react-tooltip.js -dv
scripts.watch:css: node-sass -w --output-style compressed src/scss/style.scss dist/react-tooltip.css & node-sass -w --output-style compressed src/scss/style.scss example/src/react-tooltip.css
scripts.build: npm run build:js & npm run build:css
scripts.dev: npm run watch:js & npm run watch:css
